## Prerequisites üîß

```{r prerequisites}
# Install required packages
install.packages("redcapAPI")    # CRAN package for REDCap API
install.packages("tidyverse")    # Collection of data science packages
```

- **R & RStudio installed**  
- **REDCap project URL** and **API token** obtained from your REDCap administrator  
- Internet access to your REDCap server  

## 1. Connect to REDCap API üîë

```{r connect}
library(redcapAPI)
library(tidyverse)

redcap_url <- "https://redcap.example.edu/api/"   # Your REDCap API endpoint
api_token  <- "YOUR_API_TOKEN_HERE"               # Keep this secret!

rccon <- redcapConnection(
  url   = redcap_url,
  token = api_token
)
```

## 2. Export Project Metadata üóÇÔ∏è

```{r export_metadata}
dict <- exportMetaData(rccon)      

dict %>% 
  select(field_name, form_name, field_type) %>% 
  head()
```

## 3. Export Records üì•

```{r export_records}
records <- exportRecords(
  rccon,
  factors = FALSE,
  labels  = TRUE
)

glimpse(records)
```

## 4. Data Cleaning & Summary with tidyverse üìä

```{r data_cleaning}
records2 <- records %>% 
  mutate(
    height_m = height_cm / 100,
    bmi      = weight_kg / (height_m^2)
  ) %>% 
  select(record_id, age, height_cm, weight_kg, bmi)

records2 %>% 
  summarise(
    n     = n(),
    mean  = mean(bmi, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd    = sd(bmi, na.rm = TRUE),
    max   = max(bmi, na.rm = TRUE),
    min   = min(bmi, na.rm = TRUE)
  )
```

## 5. Import Modified Records ‚Ü©Ô∏è

```{r import_records}
to_update <- records2 %>% 
  filter(bmi > 30) %>% 
  transmute(
    record_id,
    high_bmi_flag = 1
  )

importResults <- importRecords(
  rccon,
  to_update
)

importResults
```

## 6. Error Handling & Logging üêû

```{r error_handling}
records_safe <- tryCatch(
  exportRecords(rccon),
  error = function(e) {
    message("Error exporting records: ", e$message)
    tibble()
  }
)
```
